block.name: LDPC R. U. Parity Check Matrix
block.doc:
This block creates a FEC LDPC R. U. Parity Check Matrix variable.
This variable can be used by: 1) LDPC R. U. Encoder Definition block 2) LDPC Bit Flip Decoder Definition block
The format of alist files is described at: http://www.inference.phy.cam.ac.uk/mackay/codes/alist.html
The specific format of this parity check matrix is described by Richardson and Urbanke in Appendix A of their book: Modern Coding Theory (ISBN 978-0-521-85229-6).
